entry.title: Usable Ops: How to make web infrastructure management easier.
entry.summary:
Description

Speakers: Kate Heddleston, Joyce Jang

As developer tools increase in power, the systems weâ€™re able to build do too. However, with great power comes great...complexity, and the systems we build today are more complex than ever before. This talk is about reducing the complexity of your web infrastructure, and making it easier for developers on your team to learn, use, and manage your infrastructure.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
